description:
Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math and Music the Duolingo way!  

Build real-world math skills – from calculating tips to identifying patterns – and sharpen your mental math in our Math course.

Learn how to read music and play familiar songs on your device in our Music course – no instrument required.

Whether you’re learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters keep you motivated to build solid skills across language, math and music.

• Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. And now, learn Math and Music with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo:

“Far and away the best language-learning app.” –The Wall Street Journal

“This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges – speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions – that keep me coming back for more.” –The New York Times

“Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.” – TIME Magazine

“…Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun…” - Forbes

“Our favorite language app…” - CNET

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

If you choose to purchase Super Duolingo, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.duolingo.com/terms

Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits and anyone with a personal Google Account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect – inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate and stay organised.

Classroom is designed to help teachers create, collect and mark assignments paperlessly, including time-saving features like the ability to automatically make a copy of a Google Document for each student. It also creates Drive folders for each assignment and for each student to help keep everyone organised.

Students can keep track of what's due on the Assignments page and begin working with just a click. Teachers can quickly see who has or hasn't completed the work, and provide direct, real-time feedback and marks from within Classroom.

With the mobile app for iOS, students and teachers can view their classes and communicate with their classmates in real time. Students can open their assignments and work on them right from their iPhone or iPad. Teachers can keep track of who has handed in work and mark the assignment – at school or on the go. Students and teachers receive notifications when they have new content in Classroom, so they are always up to date.

There are many benefits of using Classroom:

Easy to set up
Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.

Saves time
The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.

Improves organisation
Students can see all of their assignments on an Assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.

Enhances communication
Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.

Secure
Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, and never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.

Permissions notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Microphone: Needed to enable audio capture for recording videos to be posted to Classroom.
Photos: Needed to allow the user to attach photos or videos to Classroom. Photos or videos posted to Classroom will be stored on Google servers in order to show them in Classroom.

Ready to elevate your word power? The key to successfully expanding your vocabulary is learning new words in a way that stimulates your attention. Studies show that the most effective way of learning new words is with an app that’s specifically designed for that.


With the Vocabulary app, you can:

- Learn new words with minimal time investment, simply scrolling through your phone
- Choose your own level of difficulty, based on your current English language mastery
- Select Vocabulary categories that best suit your needs and interests
- Speak and write more concisely and confidently, with the right word at your fingertips
- Meet your linguistic goals at your own pace
- Customize the app’s features and make it work for you

The Vocabulary app will turn learning and retaining new words into a fun activity that will allow you to “wow” your friends and co-workers.

Privacy Policy: https://monkeytaps.net/privacy
Terms of Use: https://monkeytaps.net/terms

Studley AI – The AI Study Tool That Gets You Straight A’s

Forget boring flashcards and endless Google searches. Studley AI is your personal AI homework helper, AI note taker, and AI tutor. Built for students who want insane results. Whether you’re trying to keep a 4.0 GPA or just trying to pass with less stress, Studley is the smartest way to study.

Turn anything into a Study Set:
Upload your lecture slides, textbook chapter, YouTube video, PDF, or even an article link, and Studley instantly turns it into a fully editable Study Set. 

A Study Set can include:

- Flashcards (perfect for memorization)
- Multiple-choice quizzes (test your recall fast)
- Fill-in-the-blanks (strengthen active recall)
- Written tests (practice full answers)
- Tutor mode (AI explains concepts like a personal teacher)

Every question is automatically tagged (e.g., unfamiliar, learning, familiar, mastered) so you can track progress in real time. You’ll literally see your weak spots disappear as you move questions into higher mastery levels.

Progress tracking that actually works:


Our system uses Active Recall and spaced repetition to make sure you remember what you learn long term. No more rereading notes 10 times. Studley forces your brain to work with memory science, not against it. You’ll walk into every exam feeling like you’ve already taken it.

The Solve Tab – Instant Answers, Step-by-Step:


Got a tough homework problem or confusing question? Just take a pic in the Solve tab, and Studley’s AI gives you step-by-step explanations. Not just the answer. This is your 24/7 tutor that never judges you for asking “dumb” questions.

Why Studley AI beats Quizlet (and everything else):

- Smarter AI – You’re not stuck with generic flashcards; every question is made from your content.
- Tagging system – Quizlet can’t show you exactly which questions you’ve mastered vs. which still trip you up. Studley can.
- Fully editable – Change, add, or delete anything. Make it 100% your style.
- All-in-one – No switching between apps for notes, practice tests, and tutors. It’s all here.
- Built for the students who actually want to win.

Studley is powered by proven study methods like:

- Active Recall – Forces you to retrieve info from memory, which strengthens retention.
- Spaced Repetition – Keeps reviewing just before you forget, so it sticks forever.
- Bloom’s Taxonomy – Helps you move beyond memorization into deeper understanding.
- Feynman Technique – Makes sure you can explain concepts clearly, not just repeat them.

How students are using Studley to get a 4.0 GPA:

- Prepping for finals in half the time by turning whole courses into Study Sets.
- Using the tagging system to focus only on “unfamiliar” questions until they’re mastered.
- Swapping Quizlet for Studley to have AI generate better practice questions from any content.
- Getting AI tutoring on hard topics without paying $50/hour.

Why you’ll never go back to old-school studying:

- Fast – Turn any material into a Study Set in seconds.
- Personalized – Tags + progress tracking keep you working only on what matters.
- Affordable – All the features of a private tutor, without the price.
- Proven – Based on real memory science, not gimmicks.

Free to try. Access is limited on the free plan. Upgrade to get unlimited Study Sets and Solve Tab usage.

Terms: https://www.studley.ai/terms
Privacy: https://www.studley.ai/privacy

Teach Your Children to Read and Write with Jolly Phonics!
Unlock reading and writing potential with the literacy programme designed for kids and trusted by teachers worldwide. Aligned with the Science of Reading, this interactive app makes learning to read and write and building phonemic awareness fun and engaging!

What is Jolly Phonics?
Jolly Phonics is a programme for teaching reading and writing. It is based on a systematic synthetic phonics approach, and was developed by teachers Sue Lloyd and Sara Wernham. It is the first stage in teaching children to read and write using the 5 key skills. It focuses on direct, explicit instruction of phonemic awareness and phonics for both reading (decoding) and writing (encoding). Scientific research has consistently shown phonemic awareness to be essential for building strong reading, spelling and writing skills.

Why Choose Jolly Phonics?
1. Proven Success: Used in schools globally for over 30 years with proven literacy outcomes.
2. Science-Based Approach: Aligned with the Science of Reading to ensure kids build effective foundational reading and spelling skills.
3. Engaging and Multi-Sensory: Songs, actions and interactive learning games bring phonics learning to life!

Key Features That Make Learning Easy and Fun:
1. Explore All 42 Letter Sounds: Go beyond ABC with free songs and audio to help kids learn every sound.
2. Learn to Read: Build phonemic awareness with our interactive learning tools such as flashcards, wordbank and action images to enhance and support every lesson.
3. Learn to Write: Develop strong handwriting skills with step-by-step visual animations.
4. Learning Games: Learn to read and write with fun phonics learning games that reinforce kids' learning.
5. Progress Tracking: Built-in assessments to monitor children's progress and celebrate achievements.

Who Is Jolly Phonics For?
1. Kids: From preschoolers learning their first words and ABC, to confident young readers building their phonics skills.
2. Parents: Support your children's early reading, writing, and spelling journey at home with our guided lessons.
3. Teachers: A valuable classroom resource for phonics instruction.

Start Your Kids' Phonics Journey Today!
Join the millions of families and educators who have embraced the Jolly Phonics programme of learning for confident readers and writers. Whether at home or in the classroom, this app makes literacy learning simple, effective and enjoyable!

Why Phonics Instead of ABC?
1. Phonics focuses on letter-sound relationships and how sounds (phonemes) make up words. It teaches kids the valuable skill of decoding, which is essential for reading and spelling fluency.
2. ABC refers to learning letters and their names rather than their sounds. Knowing the alphabet may be a precursor to phonics but doesn't directly teach reading skills.

Learning Beyond ABC!
Jolly Phonics doesn't stop at just ABC or phonemic awareness. The app offers:
1. Advanced learning strategies
2. Comprehensive handwriting exercises
3. Fun learning games designed for children to reinforce spelling and letter sounds knowledge

Start Your Kids' Phonics Journey Today!
Join the millions of families and educators who have embraced the Jolly Phonics programme of learning for confident readers and writers. Whether at home or in the classroom, with our structured lessons, interactive tools, and a focus on foundational phonemic awareness, your kids will learn to read, write and spell confidently.

Download now and see how Jolly Phonics can transform your children's literacy learning!

Stop being addlepated with unknown words! Don’t know what ‘addlepated’ means?

Get a step ahead. While others are looking up definitions, you already know the answer. 
 
Embark on an exciting journey into the lexical world with Word of the Day. 
 
To get started, take a quick vocab test to see how many words you already know. Now you are all set to begin learning new academic, obscure, and challenging vocabulary today, and every day.
 
Whether you are a native English speaker preparing for the SAT or GRE test, an ESL learner studying for IELTS or TOEFL or someone who loves to geek out on words, Word of the Day has got you covered. 
 
Designed by a team of corpus linguists, the app’s state-of-the-art word recommendation system will suggest words tailored to your vocabulary level, interests and learning needs. 
 
The Word of the Day dictionary content (pronunciation, definitions and example sentences) is powered by Oxford Languages.
 
An in-house editorial team is here to delight you with cool new word features every single day. That’s 365 beautifully narrated and illustrated word stories a year. 

Too busy? Pick the best time to receive daily word notifications. Set up the Word of the Day widget to learn and revise recently discovered words. 
 
Love the word? Store it in your own word collection.
 
Turn word learning into a powerful self-improvement habit with Word of the Day. 
 
Become first to start a conversation. Express yourself clearly. Wow your friends, family, teachers and colleagues. Ace your tests. Improve your writing and public speaking skills. Read any scientific article in one breath. Flex your brain and keep your mind focused. Express your thoughts clearly. Sound sexier.
 
Educate yourself in a small, yet profound way with Word of the Day. 

Please note that Word of the Day is a subscription-based app. Some of the app’s features are available to Premium subscribers only.

Privacy Policy: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/terms.html

Brainly, the AI Learning Companion.
Learn with Brainly — the world’s most popular homework help app! Get quick solutions from students and Experts, while enjoying features that make studying fast, easy, and fun! In just seconds, you can find correct solutions with step-by-step explanations to help you understand concepts, boost your knowledge, and improve your grades.

- Scan a pic of your math equation or word problem to get answers in seconds using Brainly’s Scan to Solve feature!
- Improve your grades using 24/7 access to AI Tutor and Live Expert support.
- Get Expert-Verified homework answers from Community Q&A.
- Find personalized, in-depth answers powered by AI.

Get ahead in school while earning points, finding study buddies, competing with other students, and climbing the leaderboards.

– Do you struggle with math?
Math Solver to the rescue! If you’re stuck and confused, just scan a pic of the question for a fast answer in seconds, plus a step-by-step explanation. Algebra, geometry, trigonometry, or calculus: no equation is too tough for Brainly! Solve math equations and word problems at any school level — including AP and college courses.

– Why have just one study buddy when you can have millions?
Never study alone again with Brainly Community Q&A, where you can ask any question for Expert-Verified answers from users around the world! Our large community of Experts is available 24/7 to help you with any question in math, science, history, English, & other subjects. Our network of reliable moderators ensures that all the answers you get are correct and easy to understand. We also allow parents and children to pair accounts as part of our commitment to safety.

– Struggling with any particular subject or topic?
A Live Expert* will help you get back on track! Get in-depth guidance and see all the steps to make homework easier and exams less stressful. Understand complex concepts in science & math with your own learning guide at your fingertips! And for personalized AI support, you can switch to the AI Tutor for on-demand help, available in seconds.
*This feature is available if you have a Brainly Tutor Plan.

– Do you spend a lot of time searching for textbook answers?
Explore Brainly's library of solutions for structured, step-by-step answers written by Experts. Find explanations for practice questions in STEM textbooks and more by searching for your book's grade, title, author, or ISBN.

– What if we told you that studying can be fun?
Competition thrives on Brainly with learning-based leaderboards, badges, and achievements. Make tough questions a competition for others as you get rewards for answering the trickiest questions. Learning can take a lot of effort, but it doesn’t need to be all work and no play. 

– Get more out of Brainly with Brainly Plus & Brainly Tutor!
Access to Brainly is 100% free. However, if you want to enjoy all of Brainly’s features without ads, upgrade to Brainly Plus or Brainly Tutor.

***

Get fun updates from us on:
Instagram @brainly
Facebook @brainlygroup
Tiktok @brainly

For any problems, reach out to our support team: https://brainly.com/contact | contact@brainly.com
Marketing: https://brainly.com

Terms of use: https://brainly.com/pages/terms_of_use
Privacy policy: https://brainly.com/pages/privacy_policy

Play engaging quiz-based games (kahoots) at school, at home and at work, create your own kahoots and learn something new! Kahoot! brings the magic of learning for students, teachers, office superheroes, trivia fans and lifelong learners.
 
Here’s what you can do with the Kahoot! app, now available in English, Spanish (LATAM), French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Ukrainian and Korean:
 
Students
- Study with unlimited free flashcards and other smart study modes
- Join kahoots hosted live - in class or virtually - and use the app to submit answers
- Complete self-paced kahoots
- Study at home or on the go with flashcards and other study modes
- Compete with friends in study groups
- Challenge your friends with kahoots you found or created
- Create your own kahoots and add images or videos
- Host kahoots live for family and friends directly from your mobile device
 
 
Families and friends
- Find a kahoot on any topic, fit for any age
- Host a kahoot live by sharing your screen to Apple TV or via video conferencing apps
- Play a live kahoot using SharePlay. Start a FaceTime call and select the kahoot you want to play. No host is required - everyone can participate!
- Engage your kids with studying at home
- Assign a kahoot to challenge family members and friends
- Create your own kahoots and add different question types and image effects
 
Teachers
- Search among millions of ready-to-play kahoots on any topic
- Create or edit your own kahoots in minutes
- Combine different question types to increase engagement
- Host kahoots live in class or virtually for distance learning
- Assign student-paced kahoots for content review
- Assess learning outcomes with reports
 
Company employees
- Create kahoots for e-learning, presentations, events and other occasions
- Encourage audience participation with polls and word cloud questions
- Host Kahoot! live in person or in a virtual meeting
- Assign self-paced kahoots, for example, for e-learning
- Assess progress and results with reports
 
Premium features:
Kahoot! is free for teachers and their students, and it’s our commitment to keep it that way as part of our mission to make learning awesome. We offer optional upgrades that unlock advanced features, such as an image library with millions of images and advanced question types, such as puzzles, polls, open-ended questions and slides. To take advantage of these features, users will need a paid subscription.
 
To create and host kahoots in a work context, as well as get access to additional features, business users will need a paid subscription.
 
Recurring billing, cancel anytime
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
 
Privacy Policy: https://kahoot.com/privacy
Terms and conditions: https://kahoot.com/terms

Preply: Learn Languages with Real Tutors - Anytime, Anywhere

Looking for the best way to learn a new language? Preply is more than just another language learning app - it’s a complete online platform that connects you with thousands of professional tutors for live, personalised lessons. Unlike gamified apps that rely on repetitive exercises, Preply combines flexible self-study with the structure, accountability, and human connection of real teachers.

With the Preply app, you can:

• Learn on the go - Book and attend lessons from anywhere, straight from your phone.
• Access thousands of expert tutors - Choose teachers by price, ratings, availability, or specialism.
• Practise real conversations - Build confidence by speaking with a live tutor instead of memorising phrases.
• Enjoy flexible scheduling - Book lessons that fit your routine, whether daily practice or weekly study.
• Study over 90 languages - English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Arabic, and more.
• Track your progress - Follow your learning journey with clear goals and personalised feedback.

Why Choose Preply?

Most language apps stop at vocabulary drills or games. Preply takes you further by connecting you with real people who tailor every lesson to your goals. Preparing for exams? Looking to boost your career prospects or improve pronunciation? Preply tutors adapt lessons to help you reach fluency faster.

Key Benefits of the Preply App

• A structured alternative to gamified apps : Skip endless exercises and focus on meaningful progress.
• Personalised learning : Lessons tailored to your level, learning style, and objectives.
• Affordable options : Tutors for every budget, with transparent pricing and secure payments.
• Seamless experience : The same trusted Preply platform, optimised for mobile so you can learn anytime.
• Trusted worldwide : Millions of learners already use Preply to achieve their language goals.

How It Works

• Download the Preply app.
• Choose your tutor : Filter by language, specialism, budget, or availability.
• Book your first lesson : Flexible scheduling makes it easy to start.
• Learn & track your progress : Stay motivated with real results and ongoing support.

Whether you’re a beginner or advanced learner, preparing for exams, travelling abroad, or building an international career, Preply helps you succeed. With Preply, you’re not just downloading an app, you’re joining a global learning community designed to support your growth.

Learn languages your way, with the flexibility of an app and the reliability of real classes.

Start your language journey today. Download Preply and see why it’s the best app for live tutoring, online language lessons, and personalised learning.

Wayground (formerly Quizizz) is where teachers make curriculum go. Bridge district priorities and classroom realities with the supplemental curriculum platform that helps students hit grade-level standards faster. Trusted by teachers in 90% of U.S. schools and 150+ countries.

For teachers:

- Dive into a library of resources that are standards-aligned and mapped to your curriculum
- Use AI to differentiate any material so that it’s just right for each student
- Create aha moments for each student by varying the student experience across dozens of formats, modes, and question types
- Accommodate students without singling them out using 25+ accommodations and modifications unique to each student

For students:

- Join classroom sessions and assignments on any device
- Study independently with resources matched to your level
- Access accommodations and language support when needed
- Track your progress and celebrate achievements

Ready to find your way forward? Create your free account or join sessions instantly at wayground.com 

From the Wayground Community:

ADEL is the World Anti-Doping Agency’s mobile application for Anti-Doping Education and Learning. 

ADEL offers interactive and accessible education solutions and information resources for the clean sport community. ADEL empowers athletes, athletes support personnel, anti-doping practitioners and anyone who wants to learn about all things clean sport and anti-doping to find relevant education content and resources. With ADEL, you can access learning content and activities (online and offline) anytime, anywhere. View courses, learning plans and resources that are relevant to your role. Find others like you in our community resource channels where you can connect, share and learn together.

After downloading the app, please enter https://adel.wada-ama.org to access the ADEL platform. For detailed instructions about how to utilize the mobile app, please visit the ADEL Helpdesk. 

Together we can protect the spirit of sport.

Discover the World of Plants with Plantify! Welcome to "Plantify", the ultimate plant identification and care guide app. Whether you're a seasoned plant parent, a budding gardener, or someone curious about the flora around you, Plantify is your perfect companion.

Easy and Accurate Identification

Expert Plant Care Advice

• Watering, light requirements, and more - Plantify covers it all!

Educational and Fun

• Perfect for educators, students, and nature explorers.
• Expand your botanical knowledge in a fun and interactive way.

Features at a Glance:

• Quick and accurate plant and flower identification.
• Comprehensive database with rich information.
• Care guides and tips for various species.
• Regular updates with new features and plants.

Why Plantify?

• User-friendly interface and easy navigation.
• High accuracy with AI-powered identification.
• A constantly growing and evolving plant database.
• Ideal for both beginners and experts in botany.

Download Plantify now and embark on a botanical journey like never before! Your plant identification and care guide awaits.

——

Maintain your PMI(R) Professional Certification, earn Professional Development Units (PDUs), and access your AI-powered project coach all in one place. 



Originally built to help PMI-certified professionals track and report PDUs, the PMI Official App now does much more. With the latest update, you can access PMI Infinity™—your on-the-go AI coach for project success. 



Whether you’re maintaining your certification, looking for learning opportunities, or managing your next project, the PMI Official App helps you do it all from your mobile device. 

 




Maintain Your Professional Certification
 


Understand your PMI Professional Certification’s specific renewal requirements, track your progress across each segment of the Talent Triangle and report PDUs you earn on your own. 




 
Gain Project Management Expertise 

Search, filter and find courses from PMI and our Authorized Training Partners that fuel career growth and project success as you earn PDUs toward certification renewal. 




 
Learn (& Earn) On Your Terms 



From renewal reminders to PDU-earning opportunities that match your life and learning style, you’re in control of when and where you work toward renewal. 




 

Streamline Your Maintenance Experience
 


Log in with your existing PMI account for everything you need to maintain your PMI certification(s) in one simple, streamlined experience. 




 

Get AI-Powered Expert Guidance
  


Access PMI Infinity™, your secure AI project coach built for project professionals, delivering trusted answers powered by leading GenAI models and grounded in global standards from PMI.   

 

 

Shape the Future of the PMI Official Mobile App 



What features would you like next? This latest release is just the beginning for the PMI Official mobile app. Share your feedback in the app or on PMI.org at www.pmi.org/official-mobile-app. 



 
A complete list of PMI Official mobile app’s features: 

 


 


Professional Certification Maintenance 



 - Renewal Status 



 - Renewal Reminders
 

 - PDU Tracking
 


 - PDU Reporting 



 - PDU Basics Primer 



 - Learning 



 - Course Search 



 - Advanced Filtering 



 - Saved Courses 



 - Self-Paced Courses 



 

PMI Infinity 



 - Chat 



 - Document upload 



 - Chat history 



 
Personalized Utilities 



 - Single PMI Login 



 - Personalized Dashboard
 


 - Feedback Survey 



 
To learn more about PMI gold-standard certifications for Project Professionals, visit https://www.pmi.org/certifications 

 
 

To share feedback on the app, visit www.pmi.org/official-mobile-app

description:
The UWI Cave Hill Campus app brings services to your fingertips and enables you to connect with classmates and friends. Access events, calendars, contacts, maps and more! Stay organized with the timetable function, where you can save events, classes and assignments.

Maximize your full potential by challenging yourself with Peak, designed to help you expand your mental skills with 45+ fun and rewarding games.

Peak has 45+ games covering six categories, carefully developed with you in mind. Choose from our catalog of games or challenge yourself with our versatile Daily Workouts. Short on time? Don’t worry, play Coffee Break, for when you need that extra pep in your step in under five minutes. We'll also show you insights about your performance to help you support your growth, development and provide you with data-orientated feedback. 

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of brain trainers worldwide and start challenging your brain today! 

Download and play our basic version for free or upgrade to Pro to unleash the full brain training experience.

Workouts: 
- Daily brain workouts to sharpen your Memory, Attention, Problem-Solving, - Mental Agility, Language, Coordination and Emotion Control
- Play skill based workouts such as Coffee Break, Weakest Link, Low Rank and The Total Workout 
- Access our Advanced Training modules, developed in collaboration with scientists and universities.


Insights:

Train your mind with Lumosity’s fun science-based brain games, played by over 100 million users worldwide.

Lumosity is a leading brain training app with cognitive games and puzzles to exercise Memory, Attention, Problem Solving and more.

WHAT’S INSIDE THE APP
•40+ Brain games that adapt as you play
•Daily workout plans to train your brain
•Insights into your performance
•Track your progress and achieve your training goals

GET STARTED WITH A FIT TEST
Take a free, 10-minute Fit Test to set your baseline scores and see how your scores compare to others in your age group.

EXPLORE BRAIN GAMES BY SKILL
Choose the skill you want to target by playing games for speed, memory, attention, flexibility, problem-solving, math and word games. 

DAILY PERSONALIZED BRAIN WORKOUTS
Build daily habits with workouts curated for you. Get personalized challenges based on your training habits and preferences. Practice key skills through curated, targeted brain games.

DETAILED TRAINING INSIGHTS
Discover your strengths across games with in-depth performance insights. Explore patterns in your gameplay to better understand how you engage with different challenges.

THE SCIENCE BEHIND LUMOSITY

We’re a team of scientists and designers exploring new ways to challenge the brain and advance cognitive research. We take established cognitive and neuropsychological tasks, or create entirely new, experimental challenges. We then transform these tasks into games and puzzles that challenge core cognitive skills.
We also collaborate with 40+ university researchers worldwide. We provide qualified researchers free access to Lumosity’s tools, to support new investigations in the cognitive sciences.

WHO IS LUMOSITY FOR?

•People of all ages who enjoy challenging their minds with fun, challenging games
•Lifelong learners interested in games that engage cognitive skills.
•Anyone aiming to exercise Memory, Speed, Attention, or Problem Solving skills.

Whether you're drinking your morning coffee or winding down before bed, Lumosity makes it easy to fit a meaningful brain training session into your day.

Join millions using Lumosity to train their minds. Download today and build your brain training habit.

GET HELP: https://lumositybeta.zendesk.com/

LIKE US: http://facebook.com/lumosity

With NeuroNation scientific brain training you bring your brain day by day on trot. Whether it's weaker memory, dwindling concentration or thinking too slowly - only 15 minutes of training a day can make problems disappear and give your brain new momentum. Join the worldwide community of over 23 million members and treat yourself to a piece of science - right in your pocket!



**German health insurances are now reimbursing our medical device NeuroNation MED. If you have a prescription, please download the "NeuroNation MED", not this app.**

Why doing brain training with Neuronation? 
- OUTSTANDING EFFECTIVENESS: NeuroNation's brain training has been awarded the AOK Leonardo Health Prize for Digital Prevention sponsored by the German Federal Ministry of Health. 

- DIFFERENT EFFECTS: Various studies have repeatedly proven this: With brain training, you can improve your memory, noticeably reduce stress and the resulting risk of depression, increase your thinking speed and concentration and even reduce the risk of dementia by up to 48%.

- PERSONALIZATION: NeuroNation performs a comprehensive analysis of your strengths and potentials and creates a personal training plan for you that exactly meets your needs.

- CHANGE AND BALANCE: With 34 exercises on 300 levels you get a varied and motivating training for a balanced promotion of your brain.

- SCIENTIFIC BASIS: In a study conducted by NeuroNation together with the Department of General Psychology at Freie Universität Berlin, the effectiveness of NeuroNation memory training was proven.
Learn more about the science behind NeuroNation: https://blog.neuronation.com/en/science-behind-neuronation/

- DETAILED PROGRESS ANALYSIS: Thanks to many years of experience and many millions of users, we can give you the opportunity to follow your progress closely and interpret it correctly according to your comparison group.

- FUN AND MOTIVATION: Get together with friends, compare your results, train for a race and blast the old boundaries of your brain together.

- AND MUCH MORE: Join our community and convince yourself of the brain training of the latest generation. 

NEURONATION PREMIUM
- Comprehensive training program with 34 motivating exercises
- Full personalization according to your wishes, strengths and potentials
- Regular publication of new exercises and courses

Easily graph functions and equations, find special points of functions, save and share your results. Millions of people around the world use GeoGebra to learn math and science. Join us!

• Plot functions, polar and parametric curves 
• Experience transformations with sliders
• Get special points of functions: roots, min, max, intersections
• Do regression with best-fit lines 
• Search for free learning activities directly from our app
• Save and share your results with friends and teachers

We’d love to hear from you: send us your questions or feedback via Twitter @geogebra or via https://help.geogebra.org

Improve your mental health by playing brain games! 
BrainBloom is a brain training app designed to enhance your cognitive abilities with logic games, mental recall exercises, brain puzzles, ADHD games, and skillz games.

Mind Games and Brain Teasers
Challenge your mind with a wide variety of thinking games for adults crafted to hone your cognitive abilities and provide a rewarding brain fitness workout. From engaging skillz games that train your math, vocabulary, and logic skills to ADHD games aimed at improving focus and attention, BrainBloom offers something for everyone. Among the variety of mental health games, BrainBloom offers brain games for seniors designed to preserve cognitive health and keep the mind sharp.

Brain Tests & IQ Assessments
Enhance your personal growth with our diverse assessments. Track cognitive progress with IQ and ADHD tests, and explore personality insights through Brain Type and Archetype evaluations. 

Who is BrainBloom for?
Students: Conquer deadlines and ace exams with improved focus and problem-solving skills.
Professionals: Enhance cognitive performance, stay sharp under pressure, and boost critical thinking for better decision-making.
Lifelong Learners: Keep your mind active and engaged, fostering cognitive health as you age.
Enthusiasts of Connect Two Dots, One Line and other logic puzzles, BrainBloom offers stimulating mind games you'll enjoy.
Whether you’re seeking to boost your productivity or simply enjoy some mental stimulation, BrainBloom provides personalized recommendations based on your performance and preferences, ensuring a unique and effective brain training experience tailored to your needs.
The more you use BrainBloom, the more you'll advance your cognitive abilities with brain teasers that improve problem-solving and refine your critical thinking skills.

SpeedyMind Academy is a fun and exciting game to practice the basics of maths (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division), logic and attention for KS1 and KS2.

Our maths game for kids is a great way to train the brain, develop intelligence, improve memory and attention. A funny Unicorn invites you to go on an exciting journey through the world of maths and logic. The game allows you to select the level of difficulty of all tasks (maths operations and logic riddles) you would like to master, so each grade in the primary school can play it:

• Year 1, Year 2: develop logical thinking, maths games to practice addition and subtraction up to 10 and 20;
• Year 3, Year 4: train logical skills, master mental maths (addition and subtraction, multiplication and division, times tables).

By completing tasks, kids receive motivating rewards, which makes the process of solving problems even more interesting and entertaining. Bright and unique design, funny characters and creative tasks will definitely please your kids, and maths practice will turn into an exciting adventure.

Our game contains more than 500 interesting tasks in three sections:
Maths games: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division;
Logic games: sequences, analogies, scales and others;
Attention games: find the correct shadow, find the same or different and others.

Are you ready? Then go ahead! Play and master your skills!

We would love to hear your feedback. In case you have any questions or comments about the game, please write to us at academy@speedymind.net.

Research shows that one of the best ways to learn is by answering real CAPM Practice Questions, helping you retain information and do CAPM Prep with confidence. CAPM Prep Pocket Study app offers the most straightforward, quickest & most interactive way to prepare for the Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) Exam.

Unlike other CAPM exam prep apps, this CAPM Prep Pocket Study app is developed by certified project managers and follows the official PMI CAPM Exam Content Outline. It provides over 4800+ expertly crafted CAPM practice questions — one of the largest question banks available! In addition to conceptual questions, it includes several real-world scenario-based CAPM practice questions covering all CAPM exam domains to help you excel in CAPM exam prep.

Study anytime, anywhere — even in your pajamas and without an internet connection. Use tailored CAPM practice questions, customized study goals, and detailed explanations that align with the 2024 PMI CAPM Exam guidelines. Cut your study time by up to 95% compared to traditional CAPM Prep methods.

This CAPM Prep Pocket Study app provides personalized learning plans with adaptive CAPM practice questions that get more challenging as you progress, ensuring you're fully prepared for the CAPM Exam certification.

Key Features:
- Personalized Study Plans: Set daily goals, track progress, and adjust study sessions based on your performance while preparing for the CAPM Exam prep.
- Engaging CAPM Practice Questions: Access 4800+ questions aligned with CAPM Exam content, ensuring thorough coverage of the CAPM Exam and providing effective CAPM exam prep.
- Comprehensive Explanations: Every CAPM practice question includes detailed explanations to strengthen your understanding and improve CAPM prep.
- Timed Exam Simulator: Simulate real exam conditions to perfect your time management and test-taking strategies through focused CAPM prep.
- Progress Tracking: Monitor your performance with statistics on your quiz history, passing scores, and overall progress for the CAPM exam prep.
- Streaks: Stay motivated by completing daily goals for consistent CAPM exam prep.
- Offline Access: Study for the CAPM Exam on the go, even without an internet connection, and continue CAPM prep anytime, anywhere.

We've provided access to the app's full features so you can explore its benefits for your CAPM Prep before upgrading. Download now for free!

This CAPM Prep Pocket Study app offers a thorough guide spanning all CAPM Exam domains outlined by the 2024 PMI CAPM Exam Content Outline. With its focus on CAPM practice questions and CAPM exam prep, it ensures you're well-prepared and confident in the CAPM Exam testing format, easing test-day anxiety.

The CAPM Prep Pocket Study app covers all CAPM Exam Domains:
- Project Management Fundamentals and Core Concepts
- Predictive, Plan-Based Methodologies

Bonus: We have provided a section of 1500 questions to help you prepare and master the CAPM formula based questions.

Download the CAPM Prep Pocket Study app today to begin your CAPM practice, enhance your project management exam prep, and start your journey toward becoming a certified project manager!

app_name: 秒熊英语-小视频学英语
developer: Beijing Threebears Education Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
学生白领必备英语学习工具，上班时间，休息时间，休闲娱乐，玩游戏，刷视频，看电影，看动画不知不觉英语四六级。托福雅思高分考生推荐！考研背单词无聊，刷会秒熊，枯燥时间也能口语听力UP

【学习灵活】中文，英文，字幕切换，单字幕，双字幕，播放速度，随心所欲，字幕随意隐藏。帮助听力能力全面提升。小学英语，中学英语，大学英语，匹配合适的学习模式。

【科学学习】”第二语言习得”理论，创新出“字幕循环、倍速循环、回音跟读、跟读评分、盲听模式、精听模式、单词胶囊、视频背单词”等高效学习方式，为你营造学习外语的无痛学习体验。少儿启蒙式观看习得，成年兴趣电影，音乐MV，结合实用的出国外语，日常用语，当前热门视频外语版本，快速学习外语，vipjr式地英语体验，短视频刷学习视频。懒人英语学习方式

【高效记单词】中英字幕，随时暂停，速度调节，英语单词点击查看释义。释义对比百科全书，牛津词典，中英词典，灵活准确。发音跟读，美式英语，英式英语发音帮你联系发音。结合视频口语发音，帮助了解日常英语用法

【资源丰富】电影，电视剧，音乐，综艺，动画文化生活演讲，纪录片，美剧，英剧，人人美剧，新概念，四六级，中高考，VOA，科学美国人，托福，雅思，考研英语，英语趣配音视频，各个精彩片段荟萃，好看视频。老友记，陌生人的夏天，生活常识，TED演讲，幸福来敲门，豆瓣250电影，IMD500，好电影陪你学英语。百万资源让你流利说英语

【热门专辑】热搜专辑，漫威，无敌破坏王，头号玩家，这个杀手不太冷热门专辑电影片段，娱乐，科技，china daily，人文历史，社交职场，宠物，饮食，体育，日常，旅行，时尚护肤，健身，穿搭，游戏，各类热门榜单，当下流行门类，片段，影视剧，全集呈现

“搜狗输入法之父”马占凯老师倾力打造的英语学习产品，帮助广大英语学习爱好者，广大考生提升英语能力。
